response.overview: This 28-minute documentary led by gun violence survivor Oronde McClain takes us to people who we need to listen to, Philadelphians who have been impacted by the record setting violence that plagues our city. Through tears and lived experience they give a road map on how the media, journalism students and those who consume news, can do better.  The documentary was produced, directed and edited by Logan Center Director Yvonne Latty, Director of Photography was Natalie Reitz and our Production Assistant was Allison Beck.
response.title: The Second Trauma
